triggers.name: TRIGGER
triggers.description: ( Specialty - DIH igual PLMN OR Specialty - DIH igual CCM OR Specialty - DIH igual ID OR Specialty - DIH igual IM OR Specialty - DIH igual EM OR Specialty - DIH igual PD ) AND Country Code igual CL

configurationArguments.criteria: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="AND" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="HCP Primary DE.Specialty - DIH" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"4bf0aec6-5ba1-ec11-a30f-1402ec938a6c"}"><Value><![CDATA[PLMN]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="HCP Primary DE.Specialty - DIH" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"4bf0aec6-5ba1-ec11-a30f-1402ec938a6c"}"><Value><![CDATA[CCM]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="HCP Primary DE.Specialty - DIH" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"4bf0aec6-5ba1-ec11-a30f-1402ec938a6c"}"><Value><![CDATA[ID]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="HCP Primary DE.Specialty - DIH" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"4bf0aec6-5ba1-ec11-a30f-1402ec938a6c"}"><Value><![CDATA[IM]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="HCP Primary DE.Specialty - DIH" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"4bf0aec6-5ba1-ec11-a30f-1402ec938a6c"}"><Value><![CDATA[EM]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="HCP Primary DE.Specialty - DIH" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"4bf0aec6-5ba1-ec11-a30f-1402ec938a6c"}"><Value><![CDATA[PD]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet><Condition Key="HCP Primary DE.Country Code" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"4bf0aec6-5ba1-ec11-a30f-1402ec938a6c"}"><Value><![CDATA[CL]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
